text: Planomicrobium chinense is a species of bacteria. It is gram-positive. The cells are shaped like rods. Planomicrobium alkanoclasticum doesn't form spores. == References == ==Other websites== *Euz√©by: List of Prokaryotic names with Standing in Nomenclature (LPSN) Category:Gram-positive bacteria
title: Planomicrobium alkanoclasticum
